string.name: emailConfirm_subject
string.comment:
emailConfirm_subject
%s is the player's username. Please do NOT transcribe 'lichess.org', it should be kept exactly as it is written.

string.name: emailConfirm_click
string.comment:
emailConfirm_click
Part of the confirmation email upon registering for a Lichess account.
The unique reset link is presented just after this string.

resources.string: baya ringi iri kuti account yako ye Lichess itange kushanda
Kana usina kuzama kurejista neLichess siya hako zvakadaro.
Tagamuchira chikumbiro chako chekuRiseta password yeAccount yako\".\",
Kana uriwe waisa chikumbiro ichi, baya Ringi riri pasi. Kana usina kukumbira siyana hako nazvo.
Simbisa kuti iyi ndiyo email address yako itsva,%s
\"Kuti tizive kuti ndiwe muridzi weEmail iyi, tinokumbirawo kuti ubaye Ringi riri pasi apo tapota\":\":
